prompts: Create a bug and fairy-type Pokemon with vibrant colors and delicate wings.
I want a tiny Pokemon that flits around flowers and has a charming personality.
Generate a Pokemon that resembles a cute bee, with a yellow body and soft wings.
Make a small, insect-like Pokemon that has a magical aura and can pollinate flowers.
Imagine a playful creature that loves to dance in the air and collect nectar.
Design a Pokemon with large, translucent wings and a friendly demeanor for a garden setting.
Show me a whimsical Pokemon that combines elements of insects and fairy-tale magic.
